short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A new tab experience for motivation, stress relief and self-exploration.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
It transforms every new tab into a healing journey. Designed for those feeling the pressures of work and life, this unique index offers a card-drawing game that sparks inner motivation and fosters self-discovery. Seamlessly integrating therapeutic processes into your browsing experience, EchoCards invites you to explore and find solace amidst the chaos.

v1.1
Optimized UI.
